name: Improved Drag

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

sections.body: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a drag combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to drag a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense when an opponent tries to drag you.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a drag combat maneuver.
sections.name: Normal

description: You are skilled at dragging foes around the battlefield.
